title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately modifies changes
description: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately modifies changes
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered.
EB: I expect that when I remove a working set, there should be no immediate changes to the package view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a working set with one project. 
2. Select the created working set. 
3. Observe that the package view is filtered. 
4. Remove the working set and verify that there are no immediate changes to the package view.
